item.title: Mei-Lin
item.description: Mei-Lin Memory Fragments (18/18) Set BonusesPrimariesLegendary?âœ…ï¸ 6/6âœ…ï¸ 6/6âœ…ï¸ 6/6 Target Deck (2/5 +2) Playstyle Aggressive Mutant + Confiscation lets me keep using Forbidden: Violence, which quickly becomes 0-cost because of all of the card draw.
Tried a Mei-Lin + Mika + Cassius team, and it worked really well.

item.title: Duplicating cards effectively
item.description: A lot of characters benefit greatly from having a key card duplicated as many times as possible.
